I am tired of the hustle and bustle of the world. I want to just have a peaceful mind. Play the classic song "Casta diva by Maria Callas" in the Dailymotion app

Open App: Dailymotion
Click on point (405,2271)
Click on button with the text "Search for videos, channels, topics"
Type text: Casta diva by Maria Callas
Check status: successful

Show me some of the sustainability art pieces on the Pinterest app for my research on sustainable energy.

Open App: Pinterest
Click on button with the function of "Search, Tab"
Wait for response
Type text: sustainability art pieces
Click on button with the function of "Search"
Wait for response
Check status: successful

I want the video quality to always be higher. shall I am playing video, I change the video quality preferences to higher picture quality in the settings of the YouTube app.

Open App: YouTube
Wait for response
Click on button with the function of "Account"
Click on button with the text "Settings"
Click on button with the text "Video quality preferences"
Click on point (964,901)
Check status: successful
